title.rendered: A message from our Managing Director

content.rendered:
Like you, we are closely monitoring the outbreak of COVID-19 and the impact it is having in the UK and around the world. Taking into account UK Government advice, we remain open for business delivering the best in Cyber security services.

The welfare of our employees is important, so while our offices are now temporarily closed and staff are working remotely there will be no disruption in service and we aim to continue providing the same exceptional service as ever.

Customers have been asking for our support to ensure that their new or existing WFH solutions are appropriately secured. If you need assistance we’re able to provide rapid-response services to uncover critical vulnerabilities and help you prioritise risk. These include:

  • Vulnerability assessment
  • Network penetration test
  • Configuration review of cloud services
  • Webinar-based security awareness training

Finally, in the event your business suffers from a security breach, our security analyst team are on hand to provide vital assistance. If you require immediate cyber incident response, call us on 020 3997 8647.

Kind regards,
Rick Flood
Managing Director, Falanx Cyber
